text.subtitle: Learn about my work, my experience and the projects I build.

text.part1: I’m a full-stack developer based in the Netherlands, focused on building clean and useful digital products. My background is a bit different from most developers: I studied Industrial Engineering in Iran and spent several years working in accounting before moving to the Netherlands. Over time, I realized that what I enjoy most is solving problems and creating things — and that naturally led me into web development. I joined
text.part2: to learn modern JavaScript, React, and full-stack development, and I built several real projects with teams using Git, Agile, and clean coding practices. That experience showed me how much I enjoy turning ideas into functional, user-friendly interfaces.
text.part3: I work confidently with React and Node.js, and I care about good UI, clean code, and collaboration. I’m motivated, reliable, and always improving my skills. What drives me is simple: I like building things that help people, and I like working with teams who care about quality and learning.
